title: RIOTS A BULLSHITTING DOG
body:
Dear summoners, i urge you to all take great caution when doing anything with the scumbag company riot games, my main account was recently perma banned (xCombatHDx) for no real reason the original ban was for editing files in the config for league of legends. which i did not do after complaints and evidance showing i did not change anything i than receieved a new email saying that i used 3rd party programs, and after i proved that also wasnt the case they said i was a scripter? lmao. there a trash company that has no care for there players or community ive been playing this game for 5 years now. along with pbe and alpha client testing and all this has caused me to get a perma ban for no real reason other than riot not wanting to admit they made a mistake.
Im Done with riot as a company and i hope others will support me with this. because this isnt on especially for well spending long time returning league players. to get fked over like this.
